akn:section.akn:heading: Studies relating to organ donation and the recovery, preservation, and transportation of organs

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Development of supportive information The Secretary, acting through the Director of the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality, shall develop scientific evidence in support of efforts to increase organ donation and improve the recovery, preservation, and transportation of organs.
